short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Amazon product data and export it to CSV or Excel file. Extract product name, price, rating, reviews, ASIN, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
effortlessly export Amazon product data to CSV!

Extract fields including:

- SKU/ASIN
- Title
- Description
- List Price
- Lowest Price
- Detail Page URL
- Sales Rank
- Brand
- Color
- Model
- MPN
- Part Number
- Size
- Large Images
- Dimensions (Height, Length, Weight, Width)
- Features
- Reviews
- Product Specifications
- Customer Ratings
- Why choose Amazon Scraper?

Automate your data collection: Gather all necessary product details without lifting a finger.
Save time and effort: No more manual copying and pasting; our plugin does it all for you.
Comprehensive data: Get all key product attributes you need to make informed decisions and optimize your listings.
